snippet: Supreme Court Justices want to fashion legal principles that will not only resolve the disputes before them but also work when applied by lower courts in countless other cases.
abstract: Supreme Court Justices want to fashion legal principles that will not only resolve the disputes before them but also work when applied by lower courts in countless other cases; court hears arguments in two very different cases, one about murder and the other about flooding, that highlight the issue.
lead_paragraph: Supreme Court Justices want to fashion legal principles that will not only resolve the disputes before them but also work when applied by lower courts in countless other cases.

headline.seo: Supreme Court Justices Seek Broad Solutions
headline.main: Justices Press Lawyers for Broad Solutions
headline.print_headline: Justices Press Lawyers For Broad Solutions
